channel.title: Comments on: Feeding the 5000. Bejebus.
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: Roger Lewis
item.dc:creator: Roger Lewis
item.description: Patience and explanation one mind at a time Roger. Clearly with less media infrastruccture we are at a disadvantage but no movement for change has had the internet before so Organise and energise.<br />Blake believed that Paine’s “Energetic Genius” led him to perform miracles: “Is it a greater miracle to feed five thousand men with five loaves than to overthrow all the armies of Europe with a small pamphlet?”<br />http://letthemconfectsweeterlies.blogspot.se/2011/11/more-from-thomas-paine.html
item.content:encoded:
Patience and explanation one mind at a time Roger. Clearly with less media infrastruccture we are at a disadvantage but no movement for change has had the internet before so Organise and energise.
Blake believed that Paine’s “Energetic Genius” led him to perform miracles: “Is it a greater miracle to feed five thousand men with five loaves than to overthrow all the armies of Europe with a small pamphlet?”
http://letthemconfectsweeterlies.blogspot.se/2011/11/more-from-thomas-paine.html

item.title: By: Roger Erickson
item.dc:creator: Roger Erickson
item.description: the need for a new party? we've been saying that for 82 years?<br /> why are so few listening?
item.content:encoded:
the need for a new party? we've been saying that for 82 years?
why are so few listening?
